ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To enable users to set video files as their dynamic desktop and lock screen wallpapers within the KDE Plasma environment.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Plasma 6 wallpaper plugin â€¢ Plays videos on Desktop/Lock Screen â€¢ Seamless integration with KDE Plasma
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a Plasma 6 wallpaper plugin that allows users to set videos as their desktop or lock screen background. It integrates seamlessly with the KDE Plasma desktop environment to offer dynamic and personalized wallpapers.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ focuswriter | C++
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide a focused and immersive writing environment, minimizing distractions for users to concentrate on their content.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Distraction-free fullscreen interface â€¢ Hide-away UI accessed by mouse movement â€¢ Customizable themes (font, colors, background) â€¢ On-the-fly statistics â€¢ Daily goals
ðŸ“– Summary: FocusWriter is a distraction-free, fullscreen word processor designed for immersive writing. It offers a minimalist interface that hides away until needed, customizable themes for ambiance, and essential features like spell-checking and document statistics to aid productivity.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ BotCommander | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Managing and monitoring multiple Python bots through a web-based dashboard.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Web interface built on Flask â€¢ Automatic startup of all bots on launch â€¢ Monitor CPU, memory, and uptime for each bot â€¢ Bot management: start, stop, restart, disable â€¢ Display system information
ðŸ“– Summary: BotCommander is a lightweight, self-hosted web interface for managing multiple Python bots. It provides a centralized dashboard to monitor bot status, resource usage, and uptime, with functionalities to start, stop, restart, and disable individual bots.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ refract | Go
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To enforce session concurrency limits for Xray-core by blocking multiple simultaneous connections from different IPs under the same user identity.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Real-time Enforcement â€¢ Kernel-Level Blocking (ipset, iptables) â€¢ Instant Session Termination (Netlink/SOCK_DIAG) â€¢ Zero-Copy Log Parsing â€¢ Docker Ready
ðŸ“– Summary: Refract is a Go-based policy enforcement service designed to control concurrent user sessions for Xray-core. It achieves this by monitoring access logs and using Linux kernel features like Netlink and IPSet to block unauthorized connections in real-time.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ samurai | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automated moderation and enhancement of Telegram group chats.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Anti-Profanity (Russian/English) â€¢ ML-based Anti-Spam for new users â€¢ NSFW Detection (Profile Photo Analysis) â€¢ Reputation System â€¢ Report System for messages
ðŸ“– Summary: Samurai is a Python-based Telegram auto-moderator bot designed to enhance community safety and engagement. It offers features like profanity filtering, AI-powered spam and NSFW detection, a user reputation system, and scheduled announcements.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source
